pullRequest.title: [TE] frontend - harleyjj/rca - Phase 1 of custom baseline selector
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

This PR allows the UI to lever the versatility of the RCA times series endpoint to provide a broad range of baselines
Future addition to this modal will be a tab for selecting a previous range by time stamp to compare to the current window.

nodes.bodyText: Any clue on why we have a none type under Algorithm? shall we remove that.
